video.title: The Inbetweeners
video.synopsis: This rib-tickling series follows four English lads as they try -- and fail spectacularly -- to navigate the wretched no-man's land of adolescence.

episodes.synopsis: Will's parents have just divorced, and he's changed schools and made a new set of friends. But his new mates are neither that cool nor that credible.
episodes.title: First Day

episodes.synopsis: The lads bunk off school and head to Neil's house to get drunk, where Simon has a vodka-induced romantic revelation about his childhood sweetheart.
episodes.title: Bunk Off

episodes.synopsis: The boys set off on their first road trip in Simon's new car for a day out at Thorpe Park, but Will soon wishes they had never come.
episodes.title: Thorpe Park

episodes.synopsis: Will finds out that going to a mixed-sex school isn't too bad after all when he pulls the most popular girl in the year above.
episodes.title: Girlfriend

episodes.synopsis: The boys call Jay's bluff and agree to go to the Camber Sands meeting of the Caravan Club to see if it really is "like a massive orgy."
episodes.title: Caravan Club

episodes.synopsis: It's the end of term, and Will has been voted to be the new chairman of the Christmas prom committee -- an enviable position indeed.
episodes.title: Xmas Party

episodes.synopsis: A new girl, Lauren, has joined the school, and Will has taken a particular shine to her. There's only one problem -- she has her eye on Simon.
episodes.title: The Field Trip

episodes.synopsis: Jay has sorted out something for himself and Simon at his dad's plant hire. Will gets to see life in a place where he's "too clever" to actually work.
episodes.title: Work Experience

episodes.synopsis: It's Will's birthday, and he's planning a suitably grown-up dinner with a few friends and any girls they can persuade to come.
episodes.title: Will's Birthday

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to be cool, the lads head to the West End where they meet aggressive bouncers, tramps and angry bus passengers.
episodes.title: A Night Out in London

episodes.synopsis: Will is asked to coordinate the school's Duke of Edinburgh award scheme, and he immediately turns the situation to his advantage.
episodes.title: The Duke of Edinburgh Awards

episodes.synopsis: Exams are looming, and Will is getting stressed. Simon at last seems to be making some headway with Carli.
episodes.title: Exam Time

episodes.synopsis: It's the start of term, and Carli is organising a charity fashion show for the coolest and best looking kids.
episodes.title: The Fashion Show

episodes.synopsis: Simon goes to his first concert with hopes of impressing a beautiful girl -- but Will, Jay and Neil tag along and ruin his chances.
episodes.title: The Gig and the Girlfriend

episodes.synopsis: Simon might get some romantic attention from his new girlfriend, Tara -- if he lets her redesign his wardrobe.
episodes.title: Will's Dilemma

episodes.synopsis: Simon and his new girlfriend Tara are going to visit her sister at university, and the other boys invite themselves along.
episodes.title: The Trip to Warwick

episodes.synopsis: Will's mum is away for a weekend with an old schoolfriend. Will is left home alone, and the other boys take full advantage of the situation.
episodes.title: Home Alone

episodes.synopsis: Will organizes one last outing for the gang before they go their separate ways, so the four heroes pack the Fiat for a camping trip.
episodes.title: The Camping Trip
